MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to carry out repair work safely on our underground cable network near to Ardgour Parade and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at9.36am on the 17th January 2021.
